body.div: No Internet Connection
Please check your connection and try again.
Scroll Down for Troubleshooting
Are you online? (Sorry, gotta ask this first!)
Do you have a restrictive DNS, PROXY, or VPN?
Try using a public DNS like 8.8.8.8 or 1.1.1.1 to rule out DNS issues.
Have you download / modified your browser?
Pearl 1.1 require the url at line 467 to be changed!
Purpur should already be configured!
Has the CC config been changed to unblock local IPs?
CC:Tweaked ignores the config file. Do it in the mod menu!
Is the Chorus server running?
Ensure the server is accessible at `http://ip-address:5000` or example.com/test.
Have you tried a different device?
Is it possible your CraftOS ID was blocked?
Chorus allows blocking of IDs for pages and the API server.
Is your system clock correct?
An incorrect clock may cause certificate or connection errors.
Find out more at:
EnderWeb.net/help
github.com/FLESH-PRISON/EnderWeb-Resurrection/
